description.narrative:
Project Outcomes: IFC expects the Project will: i) Create ~26 direct jobs plus about 6,510 indirect and induced jobs throughout the value chain, because of increased production and downstream effects on the retail value chain ii) Increase outreach and improve business of the distributors and retailers especially in the rural areas of West Africa iii) Contribute to a low-carbon pathway by virtue of more efficient compressors and manufacturing processes, especially the replacement of existing refrigerants by ones with zero global warming potential.
Market Creation: i) Increase competitiveness in the beverage sector in North and West Africa through the demonstration of the business case for resource efficient production processes.

The proposed investment is an up to 70 million package comprised of up to 53million A-Loan from IFCs own account and up to 17million equivalent loan from IFC acting as the implementing entity of the Canada IFC Blended Finance Program (BCFP) Loan to Equatorial Coca Cola Bottling Company SL (ECCBC or the Company).
